div.p: CMIP5 model output is available online from the ESGF LLNL portal at https://esgf-node.llnl.gov/projects/esgf-llnl/. NSIDC Sea Ice Index version 3 is available online from the NSIDC website at https://nsidc.org/data/seaice_index. The version 1 data is available from the authors upon request. HadISST1 sea ice concentrations are available online from the Met Office Hadley Center website at https://www.metoffice.gov.uk/hadobs/hadisst/. HadCRUT4 temperature observations are located at https://crudata.uea.ac.uk/cru/data/temperature/. All other relevant data are available from the authors upon request.
